mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (prod_cd, vend_cd, prod_name, prod_untprc, prod_reg_date) VALUES (#{productCode}, #{vendorCode} ,#{productName} , ${productUnitPrice}, CURDATE());
mapper.select: /* 상품목록 조회 */ select prod_cd, vend_cd, prod_name, ifnull(prod_untprc, 0) as prod_untprc, prod_reg_date from products order by cast(substring_index(prod_cd, 'prod_', -1) as unsigned);
